title: A Path of Business: My Loyal and Lovely Husband - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Business Management   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Marriage   Poor to Rich   Royalty   Transmigration
author: Silent Moon   月无言
description: Jin Weiwei finds herself has traversed time and space, she wakes up in a shabby temple, remembering this life she is bullied by everyone. Her father doesn’t like her, let alone her stepmother. However, she meets a beggar in this life and climbs all the way up to the royalty.>
